title: AFCON Daily Round Up: Super Eagles beat Tunisia 3-2, Big cats Senegal and DRC stay level
summary: It was another busy day of Afcon, four games being played across Morocco, as teams in groups C and D looked to secure their spot in the knockout stages of the competition. In group D, Benin won their first game ever at an Afcon, beating Botswana 1-0. The battle of the big cats ended in gridlock as the Lions of Teranga drew against The Leopards of DR Congo.â€¦
contentText: It was another busy day of Afcon, four games being played across Morocco, as teams in groups C and D looked to secure their spot in the knockout stages of the competition. In group D, Benin won their first game ever at an Afcon, beating Botswana 1-0. The battle of the big cats ended in gridlock as the Lions of Teranga drew against The Leopards of DR Congo. In group C, Uganda and Tanzania stayed level, whilst the Super Eagles and the Eagles of Carthage battled it out for the top spot in the standings. Nigeria absolutely dominated the first half, but Tunisia snapped back, to make it 3-2 at the final whistle.
